result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)
Ignition Interlock Device Tampering/Failure to Install/Violate Court Order

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Charles E. Sumler Jr.

records.addlTxt:
NO RECORD MADE. Attorney Emily K. Gaertner in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Charles E. Sumler Jr. in court. Clerk. M.Burke. DE states he does not have DL yet. He did pay for classes and missed the start of it. He was told he needs to repay and sign back up for the class.
Status conference scheduled for December 8, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Judicial Pretrial - in court on October 5, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Due to the ongoing trial in br 2 the JPTC of 08/24/22 at 8:30 will be adjourned to 10/05/22 at 8:30. Clerk tried to call DE but the number we have on file did not work. 
DE showed up in person and notice of hearings were handed to the DE in person and clerk got updated phone number.

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
  *Not to drive w/o VALID Driver's License or a properly installed and operating IID if required

01:11 PM   Assistant District Attorney Brenda Valdes appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  The Court finds probable cause in this case today.  Def. is referred to the Public Defender.  If not eligible, def. to retain his own counsel. Court date will not be adjourned due to def.'s failure to retain counsel.  Not Guilty Plea entered by the Court.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 29, 2022 at 01:45 pm.  Judicial Pretrial - in court scheduled for August 24, 2022 at 08:30 am.. Warrant vacated. $500  Signature Bond Set w/conditions (see bond event). rb
called and spoke to Cassidy in JS @ 1:12 pm to cancel
DE schedules a voluntary appearance for 06-15-22 at 1pm Intake.   DA notified.

Arrest Warrant  KSD22316044
  MUST POST OR HOLD FOR COURT
Assistant District Attorney Daniel Bernard Deida appeared for the State.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  No appearance by defendant. Warrant Authorized. Cash bond set at $500  MUST POST OR HOLD FOR COURT
and witness list filed by the State
